Replace.Text: 可在学院上激活，与该区域相邻且当前处于帝国境内的单元格+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值、+2 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
Can activate on a Campus. +2 [ICON_Science] Science and +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for all adjacent plots that are currently within the territory of your empire.
可在圣地上激活，与该区域相邻且当前处于帝国境内的单元格+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值、+2 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
Can activate on a Holy Site. +2 [ICON_Science] Science and +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for all adjacent plots that are currently within the territory of your empire.
可在商业中心上激活，与该区域相邻且当前处于帝国境内的单元格+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值、+2 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
Can activate on a Commercial Hub. +2 [ICON_Science] Science and +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for all adjacent plots that are currently within the territory of your empire.
可在剧院广场上激活，与该区域相邻且当前处于帝国境内的单元格+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值、+2 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
Can activate on a Theater. +2 [ICON_Science] Science and +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for all adjacent plots that are currently within the territory of your empire.
可在学院上激活，该学院的 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值相邻加成+50%。
Can activate on a Campus. +50% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science adjacency bonus for this Campus.
为原子能时代所有科技启动 [ICON_TechBoosted] 尤里卡时刻。
Triggers the [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka moment for all Atomic era technologies.
为未来时代所有科技启动 [ICON_TechBoosted] 尤里卡时刻。
Triggers the [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka moment for all Future era technologies.
立即获得精炼和化学科技。
Grant Refining and Chemistry technology.
获得一个随机科技和一个随机市政。
Grant a random technology and a random civic.
获得两个随机科技和两个随机市政。
Grant two random technology and two random civic.
在标准速度下，所在单元格每相邻一个山脉单元格获得600 [ICON_Science] 科技值和600 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
Gain 600 [ICON_Science] Science and 600 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture (on Standard speed) for each adjacent Mountain tile.
该城市每个 [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] 文物获得1000 [ICON_Science] 科技值和1000 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
Gain 1000 [ICON_Science] Science and 1000 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture (on Standard speed) for every [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifact in this city.
为当前或附近每个雨林单元格获得1000 [ICON_Science] 科技值与1000 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
Gain 1000 [ICON_Science] Science and 1000 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each Rainforest tile here or adjacent.
在标准速度下，从此处或相邻的每个自然奇观单元格获得1000 [ICON_Science] 科技值和1000 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
Gain 1000 [ICON_Science] Science and 1000 [ICON_Culture] Culture (on Standard speed) for each natural wonder tile here or adjacent.
立即在该城市中建造远古城墙、中世纪城墙、文艺复兴城墙。
Instantly builds Ancient, Medieval, and Renaissance Walls in this city.
所有工业区一级建筑+3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。
+3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for all Industrial Zone tier 1 buildings.
所有工业区二级建筑+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。
+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for all Industrial Zone tier 2 buildings.
所有工业区三级建筑+5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。
+5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for all Industrial Zone tier 3 buildings.
该城市可无视 [ICON_Citizen] 人口数量限制再建造一个区域。
Lets this city build one more district than the [ICON_Citizen] Population limit allows.
该城市可无视 [ICON_Citizen] 人口数量限制再建造一个区域。
Lets this city build one more district than the [ICON_Citizen] Population limit allows.
可在工业区上激活，该区域的建筑辐射范围延伸3个单元格。该区域建筑的辐射产出+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
Can activate on a Industrial Zone. This district's regional buildings reach 3 tiles farther. This district's buildings provide +2 [ICON_Production] Production.
可在学院上激活，该区域的建筑辐射范围延伸3个单元格。该区域建筑的辐射产出+2 [ICON_Science] 科技值。
Can activate on a Campus. This district's regional buildings reach 3 tiles farther. This district's buildings provide +2 [ICON_Science] Science.
可在剧院广场上激活，该区域的建筑辐射范围延伸3个单元格。该区域建筑的辐射产出+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
Can activate on a Theater. This district's regional buildings reach 3 tiles farther.This district's buildings provide +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
可在商业中心上激活，该区域的建筑辐射范围延伸3个单元格。该区域建筑的辐射产出+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
Can activate on a Commercial Hub. This district's regional buildings reach 3 tiles farther.This district's buildings provide +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
可在娱乐中心上激活，该区域的建筑辐射范围延伸3个单元格。该区域建筑的辐射产出+1 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度。
Can activate on a Entertainment Complex. This district's regional buildings reach 3 tiles farther. This district's buildings provide +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.
建造工业区后释放文化炸弹。
Can trigger a culture bomb upon finishing a Industrial Zone.
可在工业区上激活，与该区域相邻且当前处于帝国境内的单元格+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值、+2 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
Can activate on a Industrial Zone. +2 [ICON_Science] Science and +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for all adjacent plots that are currently within the territory of your empire.
该城市+4 [ICON_Housing] 住房，+2 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度。
+4 [ICON_Housing] Housing and +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities for this city.
该城市每个有地貌或自然奇观的单元格+1 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩。
+1 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism for all tiles with feature or natural wonder for this city..
